text: Israa-iil xayloh bad baxisneeh kaak ken tabisneh, tokkel Firqawnaa kee kay qande dulmii kee caddok taturuh ken katatte, Firqawna xuumiyyi kaa geeh kaa matre waqdi, diggah usuk (Yalla kinnuk) israa-iil xaylo nummasse Yallak sa Yalli aneewaamal anu eemeneeh, anu muslimiinik numuk teyna kinniyo iyye
